main event: A bright greenish-white object with flashing lights, shaped like an inverted cone and the size of a basketball, was seen moving slowly to the northeast and fading slowly.
interesting points: The object had a shape of an inverted cone and was the size of a basketball.
The object had flashing lights and was a bright greenish-white color.
The object moved slowly to the northeast and then faded slowly.
The witness was a former Navy radar and electronics technician.
sighted object: bright greenish-white object with flashing lights, shaped like an inverted cone
witnesses: 1 witness, a salesman with 4 years of Navy radar and electronics experience
